Name: Abandon
I (Rare): At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 0 RA and 0 max WP [+1]
II (Mythical): At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 1 RA and 1 max WP [+2]
III (Legendary): At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 1 RA and 1 max WP [+3]
Notes: It scales by one every two levels, at level 4 is +2 RA & WP and at level 6 is +3 RA & WP And It appears that only the Mystical version is available now (update 1.73.1)

Name: About-Turn
II (Mythical): When the state bearer suffers direct close-combat damage, once per turn of the attacker: The state bearer turns toward them [+2]

Name: Accumulation
I (Rare): -20% Heals performed For each turn without performing heals: 5% Heals performed Stackable up to 40% [+1]
II (Mythical): -20% Heals performed For each turn without performing heals: 10% Heals performed Stackable up to 40% [+2]
III (Legendary): -20% Heals performed For each turn without performing heals: 15% Heals performed Stackable up to 40% [+3]

Name: Altruism
I (Rare): 2% Heals performed on an aligned ally at a distance [+1]
II (Mythical): 4% Heals performed on an aligned ally at a distance [+2]
III (Legendary): 6% Heals performed on an aligned ally at a distance [+3]

Name: Ambition
I (Rare): At the start of the first turn, if secondary masteries are <= 0: 5% Critical Hit [+1]
II (Mythical): At the start of the first turn, if secondary masteries are <= 0: 10% Critical Hit [+2]
III (Legendary): At the start of the first turn, if secondary masteries are <= 0: 15% Critical Hit [+3]

Name: Ambush
I (Rare): 2% Damage Inflicted on targets in close combat [+1]
II (Mythical): 4% Damage Inflicted on targets in close combat [+2]
III (Legendary): 6% Damage Inflicted on targets in close combat [+3]

Name: AP Return (old Return)
II (Mythical): Recovers 1 AP on killing an enemy (2 activations per turn) [+2]
Notes: <- Level 4 lets you recover 2 AP for 2 times per turn.

Name: Arcana
I (Rare): If the state bearer does not have any armor at end of turn: 50% of level as Armor [+1]
II (Mythical): If the state bearer does not have any armor at end of turn: 100% of level as Armor [+2]
III (Legendary): If the state bearer does not have any armor at end of turn: 150% of level as Armor [+3]

Name: Armor Length
I (Rare): 4% Armor given to an aligned ally at a distance [+1]
II (Mythical): 8% Armor given to an aligned ally at a distance [+2]
III (Legendary): 12% Armor given to an aligned ally at a distance [+3]

Name: Armor Return
II (Mythical): Regains 5% of max HP as Armor by killing an enemy (2 activations per turn) [+2]

Name: Art Of Concealment
I (Rare): -6% Damage received when the bearer is not in line of sight 3% Damage received when the bearer is in line of sight [+1]
II (Mythical): -12% Damage received when the bearer is not in line of sight 6% Damage received when the bearer is in line of sight [+2]
III (Legendary): -18% Damage received when the bearer is not in line of sight 9% Damage received when the bearer is in line of sight [+3]

Name: Bashell
I (Rare): 6% Damage inflicted on a target with armor [+1]
II (Mythical): 12% Damage inflicted on a target with armor [+2]
III (Legendary): 18% Damage inflicted on a target with armor [+3]

Name: Berserk Block
I (Rare): When HP are at less than 50%: 5% Block [+1]
II (Mythical): When HP are at less than 50%: 10% Block [+2]
III (Legendary): When HP are at less than 50%: 15% Block [+3]
ObtainedFrom: Badgwitch the Furiox (200) 1 Stele or more [4%] [1%] [0.5%]

Name: Berserk Critical
I (Rare): When HP are at less than 50%: 5% Critical Hit [+1]
II (Mythical): When HP are at less than 50%: 10% Critical Hit [+2]
III (Legendary): When HP are at less than 50%: 15% Critical Hit [+3]
ObtainedFrom: Ghost Tanukouï San (200) 1 Stele or more [4%] [1%] [0.5%]

Name: Berserk Dodge
I (Rare): When HP are at less than 50%: 10% Dodge [+1]
II (Mythical): When HP are at less than 50%: 20% Dodge [+2]
III (Legendary): When HP are at less than 50%: 30% Dodge [+3]

Name: Berserk Lock
I (Rare): When HP are at less than 50%: 10% Lock [+1]
II (Mythical): When HP are at less than 50%: 20% Lock [+2]
III (Legendary): When HP are at less than 50%: 30% Lock [+3]

Name: Berserk Wakfu
I (Rare): When the state bearer starts their turn with 50% or less of their WP (or their QB): 3% Critical Damage inflicted (1 turn) 100% of level as Armor [+1]
II (Mythical): When the state bearer starts their turn with 50% or less of their WP (or their QB): 6% Critical Damage inflicted (1 turn) 200% of level as Armor [+2]
III (Legendary): When the state bearer starts their turn with 50% or less of their WP (or their QB): 9% Critical Damage inflicted (1 turn) 300% of level as Armor [+3]

Name: Blocking Expert
II (Mythical): -50 Elemental Resistance -15% Damage received during a Block [+2]

Name: Blood Carapace
I (Rare): At start of turn: Converts 10% of current HP into Armor [+1]
II (Mythical): At start of turn: Converts 20% of current HP into Armor [+2]
III (Legendary): At start of turn: Converts 30% of current HP into Armor [+3]

Name: Brawling
I (Rare): -1 Range 50% of level as Lock and Dodge [+1]
II (Mythical): -1 Range 100% of level as Lock and Dodge [+2]

Name: Carapace
I (Rare): -2 max AP 75 Elemental Resistance [+1]
II (Mythical): -1 max AP 75 Elemental Resistance [+2]

Name: Carnage
I (Rare): When HP are above 90%: 15% of level in Elemental Mastery [+1]
II (Mythical): When HP are above 90%: 30% of level in Elemental Mastery [+2]
III (Legendary): When HP are above 90%: 45% of level in Elemental Mastery [+3]

Name: Clamor (old Condemnation II)
II (Mythical): -20 Force of Will Reduces the 2 next MP losses suffered by 1 The effect is reapplied every turn [+2]

Name: Condemnation
II (Mythical): -20 Force of Will Reduces the 2 next AP losses suffered by 1 The effect is reapplied every turn [+2]

Name: Conservation
I (Rare): When HP are above 90%: 10% Block [+1]
II (Mythical): When HP are above 90%: 20% Block [+2]
III (Legendary): When HP are above 90%: 30% Block [+3]

Name: Counterattack
I (Rare): When the state bearer suffers direct close-combat damage, once per turn of the attacker: The state bearer inflicts light damage on the attacker (10% of level) [+1]
II (Mythical): When the state bearer suffers direct close-combat damage, once per turn of the attacker: The state bearer inflicts light damage on the attacker (20% of level) [+2]
III (Legendary): When the state bearer suffers direct close-combat damage, once per turn of the attacker: The state bearer inflicts light damage on the attacker (30% of level) [+3]

Name: Courage
I (Rare): 2% non-critical damage and heals inflicted -2% critical damage and heals inflicted [+1]
II (Mythical): 4% non-critical damage and heals inflicted -4% critical damage and heals inflicted [+2]
III (Legendary): 6% non-critical damage and heals inflicted -6% critical damage and heals inflicted [+3]

Name: Critical Hit Expert
I (Rare): At end of turn, if a critical hit was performed:  Heal: 2% of HP lost of the caster [+1]
II (Mythical): At end of turn, if a critical hit was performed:  Heal: 4% of HP lost of the caster [+2]
III (Legendary): At end of turn, if a critical hit was performed:  Heal: 6% of HP lost of the caster [+3]

Name: Critical Preparation
I (Rare): Each time a critical hit is performed (5 activations per turn): Preparation (+2 Lvl.) [+1]
II (Mythical): Each time a critical hit is performed (5 activations per turn): Preparation (+4 Lvl.) [+2]
III (Legendary): Each time a critical hit is performed (5 activations per turn): Preparation (+6 Lvl.) [+3]

Name: Cyclical Ruin
II (Mythical): 20% indirect Damage in even rounds [+2]

Name: Cyclothymia
I (Rare): Even turns: 10 Force of Will Odd turns: -10 Force of Will [+1]
II (Mythical): Even turns: 20 Force of Will Odd turns: -10 Force of Will [+2]

Name: Delay
I (Rare): At start of turn, if no WP were used during the previous turn: 4% Damage inflicted 4% Heals performed [+1]
II (Mythical): At start of turn, if no WP were used during the previous turn: 8% Damage inflicted 8% Heals performed [+2]
III (Legendary): At start of turn, if no WP were used during the previous turn: 12% Damage inflicted 12% Heals performed [+3]

Name: Destruction
I (Rare): 3% Damage from behind -2% frontal and side Damage [+1]
II (Mythical): 6% Damage from behind -4% frontal and side Damage [+2]
III (Legendary): 9% Damage from behind -6% frontal and side Damage [+3]

Name: Determination
II (Mythical): -15% indirect Damage received [+2]
ObtainedFrom: Robowl the Outcast (170) 1 Stele or more [-] [1%] [-]

I (Rare): At start of fight: All Masteries: 5% of level All Resistances: 3 [+1]
II (Mythical): At start of fight: All Masteries: 10% of level All Resistances: 6 [+2]
III (Legendary): At start of fight: All Masteries: 15% of level All Resistances: 9 [+3]

III (Legendary): 1 WP -10 Force of Will [+3]

Name: Dimensionality
II (Mythical): On the state bearer's first turn: 1 WP (non-regenerable) [+2]

I (Rare): Reduces Ranged Damage suffered by 50% of level, 2 times per turn [+1]
II (Mythical): Reduces Ranged Damage suffered by 50% of level, 4 times per turn [+2]
III (Legendary): Reduces Ranged Damage suffered by 50% of level, 6 times per turn [+3]

I (Rare): 4% Damage Inflicted on targets 2 cells away (1 cell between the state bearer and the target) [+1]
II (Mythical): 8% Damage Inflicted on targets 2 cells away (1 cell between the state bearer and the target) [+2]

Name: Dodge Steal
I (Rare): -10% Damage inflicted with a weapon When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Steals 15% of level in Dodge (1 turn, not stackable) [+1]
II (Mythical): -10% Damage inflicted with a weapon When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Steals 30% of level in Dodge (1 turn, not stackable) [+2]
III (Legendary): -10% Damage inflicted with a weapon When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Steals 45% of level in Dodge (1 turn, not stackable) [+3]

Name: Endurance
I (Rare): -5% to characteristic penalties received. Affects all characteristic penalties (Masteries, Resistances, Armor, Critical Hits, etc.) received in combat and cast by an entity other than the state bearer. The value is always rounded down. [+1]
II (Mythical): -10% to characteristic penalties received. Affects all characteristic penalties (Masteries, Resistances, Armor, Critical Hits, etc.) received in combat and cast by an entity other than the state bearer. The value is always rounded down. [+2]
III (Legendary): -15% to characteristic penalties received. Affects all characteristic penalties (Masteries, Resistances, Armor, Critical Hits, etc.) received in combat and cast by an entity other than the state bearer. The value is always rounded down. [+3]
Notes: <- The Encyclopedia says the level I cannot be dropped atm

Name: Evasion
I (Rare): At start of fight: 5% Block (1 turn) [+1]
II (Mythical): At start of fight: 10% Block (1 turn) [+2]
III (Legendary): At start of fight: 15% Block (1 turn) [+3]

Name: Evasion
I (Rare): At start of fight: 50% of level as Dodge [+1]
II (Mythical): At start of fight: 100% of level as Dodge [+2]
III (Legendary): At start of fight: 150% of level as Dodge [+3]

II (Mythical): At the start of combat, per MP above 4: 4% Damage inflicted (maximum 24) [+2]
III (Legendary): At the start of combat, per MP above 4: 6% Damage inflicted (maximum 24) [+3]

II (Mythical): Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -10% Heals performed to it (1 turn) [+2]
III (Legendary): Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -15% Heals performed to it (1 turn) [+3]

I (Rare): Gains 50% of level as Flaming on killing an enemy (1 activation per turn) [+1]
II (Mythical): Gains 100% of level as Flaming on killing an enemy (1 activation per turn) [+2]

Name: Flee
II (Mythical): After dodging (with loss): 1 MP (1 max per turn) [+2]
Notes: Not yet on craftku Stacks on the limit per turns

Name: Focalization (old Frenzy III)
II (Mythical): -15% Damage inflicted At start of turn: 25% Damage inflicted if a single enemy was hit the previous turn [+2]

II (Mythical): -20% Damage inflicted At start of turn: 10% Damage inflicted per enemy hit in the previous turn. [+2]

III (Legendary): 15% health points (bonus on HP modifier) [+3]

II (Mythical): 6% Critical Hit [+2]
III (Legendary): 9% Critical Hit [+3]

III (Legendary): At start of fight: 150% of level as Lock [+3]

III (Legendary): After locking an enemy: 150% of level as Armor [+3]

III (Legendary): When the bearer starts their turn below 20% HP: 9% Damage inflicted (1 turn) 150% of level as armor [+3]

III (Legendary): As long as the bearer has no Armor: 9% Damage inflicted [+3]

I (Rare): If there are two or more allies 1 to 4 cells from the bearer: 2% Damage Inflicted [+1]
II (Mythical): If there are two or more allies 1 to 4 cells from the bearer: 4% Damage Inflicted [+2]
III (Legendary): If there are two or more allies 1 to 4 cells from the bearer: 6% Damage Inflicted [+3]

Name: Slow Evasion (old Evasion II)
II (Mythical): 3% Blocks per turn (max 40) [+2]

Name: Slow Influence (old Influence II)
I (Rare): 1% Critical Hits per turn (max 30) [+1]
II (Mythical): 2% Critical Hits per turn (max 30) [+2]
III (Legendary): 3% Critical Hits per turn (max 30) [+3]
ObtainedFrom: Robowl the Outcast (170) 2 Steles or more [4%] [1%] [0.5%]

Name: Social Relations
I (Rare): 2% Damage from behind on even turns 2% frontal Damage on odd turns [+1]
II (Mythical): 4% Damage from behind on even turns 4% frontal Damage on odd turns [+2]
III (Legendary): 6% Damage from behind on even turns 6% frontal Damage on odd turns [+3]

Name: Solid Weapon
I (Rare): When inflicting damage on an enemy with a weapon: That enemy reduces their damage on the state bearer by -5% (1 turn, not stackable) The state bearer must have a shield equipped [+1]
II (Mythical): When inflicting damage on an enemy with a weapon: That enemy reduces their damage on the state bearer by -10% (1 turn, not stackable) The state bearer must have a shield equipped [+2]

Name: Solidity
II (Mythical): Reduces direct damage received greater than 20% of max HP by 400% of level (once per round) [+2]

Name: Spines
I (Rare): Performing a Block gives Preparation (+1 Lvl.) [+1]
II (Mythical): Performing a Block gives Preparation (+2 Lvl.) [+2]
III (Legendary): Performing a Block gives Preparation (+3 Lvl.) [+3]

Name: Strong Hand
I (Rare): Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -5% Armor received to it (1 turn) [+1]
II (Mythical): Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -10% Armor received to it (1 turn) [+2]
III (Legendary): Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -15% Armor received to it (1 turn) [+3]

Name: Stupefaction
I (Rare): At start of fight: 5% Critical Hit (1 turn) 5% of level as Critical Mastery (1 turn) [+1]
II (Mythical): At start of fight: 10% Critical Hit (1 turn) 10% of level as Critical Mastery (1 turn) [+2]
III (Legendary): At start of fight: 15% Critical Hit (1 turn) 15% of level as Critical Mastery (1 turn) [+3]
ObtainedFrom: Badgwitch the Furiox (200) 2 Steles or more [4%] [1%] [0.5%]

Name: Swiftness
I (Rare): 1 MP -20% Damage inflicted [+1]
II (Mythical): 1 MP -10% Damage inflicted [+2]
Notes: <- One linked version of the level II can also be obtained from the Pandalucia level 186 quest.

Name: Tactical Critical
I (Rare): 3% critical damage inflicted if the target has > 50% HP -3% critical damage inflicted if the target has ≤ 50% HP [+1]
II (Mythical): 6% critical damage inflicted if the target has > 50% HP -6% critical damage inflicted if the target has ≤ 50% HP [+2]
III (Legendary): 9% critical damage inflicted if the target has > 50% HP -9% critical damage inflicted if the target has ≤ 50% HP [+3]

Name: Technical Critical
I (Rare): The first critical hit in the turn inflicts 6% addititional damage The following ones inflict 3% less damage [+1]
II (Mythical): The first critical hit in the turn inflicts 12% addititional damage The following ones inflict 6% less damage [+2]

Name: Tenacity
II (Mythical): At end of turn, if the state bearer has 2 or more AP: 25 Elemental Resistance (1 turn) [+2]

Name: Theory Of Matter
I (Rare): 50% Critical Hit -50% Damage and Heals [+1]
II (Mythical): 100% Critical Hit -50% Damage and Heals [+2]
ObtainedFrom: Vertox the Timeless (170) 1 Stele or more [4%] [1%] [-]

Name: Tolerance
I (Rare): At end of turn: 50% of unused MP are carried over to the next turn Max 1 MP [+1]
II (Mythical): At end of turn: 50% of unused MP are carried over to the next turn Max 2 MP [+2]

Name: Topology
I (Rare): At the start of combat: All of the state bearer's Dodge is converted into Armor at a ratio of 1 for 1. Converted Dodge is lost. [+1]
II (Mythical): At the start of combat: All of the state bearer's Dodge is converted into Armor at a ratio of 1 for 2. Converted Dodge is lost. [+2]
III (Legendary): At the start of combat: All of the state bearer's Dodge is converted into Armor at a ratio of 1 for 3. Converted Dodge is lost. [+3]

Name: Vampiric Madness
I (Rare): -4% Heals received When the bearer inflicts damage in a diagonal line: Steals 4% of damage inflicted [+1]
II (Mythical): -8% Heals received When the bearer inflicts damage in a diagonal line: Steals 8% of damage inflicted [+2]
III (Legendary): -12% Heals received When the bearer inflicts damage in a diagonal line: Steals 12% of damage inflicted [+3]

Name: Visibility
I (Rare): 1 Range -300 Lock -300 Dodge [+1]
II (Mythical): 1 Range -150 Lock -150 Dodge [+2]

Name: Vital Agility
II (Mythical): At start of turn, if HP are above 90%: 1 MP [+2]

Name: Vital Influence
I (Rare): When HP are above 90%: 4% Critical Hit [+1]
II (Mythical): When HP are above 90%: 8% Critical Hit [+2]
III (Legendary): When HP are above 90%: 12% Critical Hit [+3]

Name: Vital Return
I (Rare): Heal: 10% of HP lost of the caster   on killing an enemy (2 activations per turn) [+1]
II (Mythical): Heal: 20% of HP lost of the caster   on killing an enemy (2 activations per turn) [+2]

Name: Vital Strength
II (Mythical): At start of turn, if HP are above 90%: 1 AP [+2]

Name: Vitality Well
I (Rare): Increases Health Steals performed by 5% [+1]
II (Mythical): Increases Health Steals performed by 10% [+2]
III (Legendary): Increases Health Steals performed by 15% [+3]

Name: Vivacity
I (Rare): 1 AP -150 Elemental Resistance [+1]
II (Mythical): 1 AP -75 Elemental Resistance [+2]
Notes: <- One linked version of the level II can also be obtained from the Pandalucia level 186 quest.

Name: Wakfu Influence
I (Rare): When the state bearer starts their turn with all their WP (or all their QB): 10% Critical Hit (1 turn) [+1]
II (Mythical): When the state bearer starts their turn with all their WP (or all their QB): 20% Critical Hit (1 turn) [+2]

Name: Wall
I (Rare): At start of fight, 150% of level as Armor [+1]
II (Mythical): At start of fight, 300% of level as Armor [+2]
III (Legendary): At start of fight, 450% of level as Armor [+3]
